E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Arthur Rhodes
Dear Sir,
Arthur Rhodes has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 3.94 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Mark Guthrie
Dear Sir,
Mark Guthrie is doing pretty good at A Winter Haven Red Sox!
He has an ERA of 1.41, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/9/1989
Subject: Felix Fermin
Felix Fermin is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1989
Subject: Joel McKeon is sick...
Diagnosis: Sore Back.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor
